alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Southeast Van Buren County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Perry, southeastern Van Buren, southwestern Cleburne, eastern Conway and northwestern Faulkner Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 908 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Whipple to Solgohachia. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conway... Morrilton... Greenbrier... Mayflower... Wooster... Quitman... Guy... Damascus... Twin Groves... Menifee... Bethlehem... Hill Creek... Pickles Gap... Solgohachia... Catholic Point... Middleton... Lanty... Fairbanks... Mallet Town... Whipple... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Southeast Van Buren County
